subject: AI & Agents
title: Auditing AI Systems
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Auditing AI Systems.

hook.text: We audit financial systems annually. Why don't we audit AI systems the same way?

buildup.text: AI audits test systems for bias, accuracy, security, and compliance with regulations.

discovery.text: Third-party auditors can probe models with test cases designed to expose failure modes.

twist.text: Many companies resist audits, claiming models are proprietary trade secrets.

climax.text: New York City passed a law requiring audits of AI hiring tools. Others may follow.

punchline.text: Trust but verify â€” especially when the decision-maker is a machine.

quiz.question: What do AI audits test for?
options: Bias, accuracy, security, and regulatory compliance
